snippet: The attack killed two civilian workers, the United Nations peacekeeping mission said Saturday. Another member of the team was wounded but escaped with others in the convoy.
abstract: United Nations peacekeeping mission reports UN convoy near Gao, Mali, was halted by two assailants who shot and killed two civilian drivers and torched the vehicles; strike occurs days after UN peacekeeping base in same area was attacked by Algerian terrorist group.
lead_paragraph: The attack killed two civilian workers, the United Nations peacekeeping mission said Saturday. Another member of the team was wounded but escaped with others in the convoy.

headline.main: Mali: 2 Dead in Attack on U.N. Convoy
headline.print_headline: Africa; Mali: Gunmen Attack a U.N. Convoy
